text: Saint-Yan is a commune in eastern France. It lies in the region of Bourgogne- Franche-Comté. Today, about 1.141 people live in the city. == Education == A campus of the École nationale de l'aviation civile (French civil aviation university) is located at Saint-Yan. == Transports == * Saint-Yan Airport Category:Communes in Saône-et-Loire
title: Saint-Yan
